snippet: An appeals court has resurrected a lawsuit by an Arizona death-row inmate who alleged a prison officer violated his constitutional rights by reading a letter he wrote to his lawyer....

headline.print_headline: Court Resurrects Arizona Death-Row Inmate's Suit
headline.main: Court Resurrects Arizona Death-Row Inmate's Suit

lead_paragraph: An appeals court has resurrected a lawsuit by an Arizona death-row inmate who alleged a prison officer violated his constitutional rights by reading a letter he wrote to his lawyer.
